r.d: Rar is a powerful and effective archiver, which was created by Eugene Roshal and became rather popular quite fast. This extension gives you possibility to read Rar archives.
r.n: 1) Added open_basedir and safe_mode checks. 2) Fixed Win32 build issues (thanks to Edin). Currently only 5.x builds are available. 3) Added OS constants. 4) Fixed 0 bugs. There are no bugs, wee =)
